TopicTitle: Alert, Incoming Nooblar from a Mile High!

Articles.Content: Hello all from Denver. Happy to be a part of the forum. Nice to see many fellow space nerds here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Anyone tell me why I can't find where to add my profile pic or avatar??? Can't seem to find the option to add one anywhere ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Hi and welcome to the forum.

About your question, it has a fine answer [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637100&viewfull=1#post637100) (you may also need to learn about the Curious George Usergroup [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637059&viewfull=1#post637059); that thread includes many other useful answers).

A mile up? Time to start your gravity turn!

Welcome aboard!

> 
> Hi and welcome to the forum.
> About your question, it has a fine answer [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637100&viewfull=1#post637100) (you may also need to learn about the Curious George Usergroup [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637059&viewfull=1#post637059); that thread includes many other useful answers).

Diomedea, thank you very much for this information. I'll get right on this! 

> 
> A mile up? Time to start your gravity turn!
> Welcome aboard!

Dman, thanks for the welcome and see you @ zero G!
Welcome, welcome! When you reach 3/4 of a mile, call the ball!
